DataElement.preferredDefinition: The procedure used to obtain biospecim(s)

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Prostate Neoplasm Item Collection Specimen Characteristic Surgical Procedure
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A benign or malignant tumor involving the prostate gland. -- 2003:A group of items of the same type, gathered for display or study.:A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid ta:The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance._Surgical Procedure is a diagnostic or treatment medical procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Prostate Neoplasm Item Collection Specimen Characteristic
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A benign or malignant tumor involving the prostate gland. -- 2003:A group of items of the same type, gathered for display or study.:A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid ta:The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.

Concepts.definition: A benign, borderline, or malignant neoplasm that affects the prostate gland.  Representative examples include benign prostate phyllodes tumor, prostatic intraepithelial neoplasia, prostate carcinoma, and prostate sarcoma.
A group of items of the same type, gathered for display or study.

A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.
The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.

Property.preferredDefinition: Surgical Procedure is a diagnostic or treatment medical procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue.

Concepts.definition: A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredName: Prostate Surgical Pathology Specimen Surgical Procedure NCI Concept Code
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Name of surgical procedure used to obtain the specimen._A concept unique identifier within the NCI Enterprise Vocabulary Service's NCI Thesaurus._A group of things of the same kind that belong together and are so used.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The removal of a tissue sample using a needle with a relatively large diameter, for microscopic examination.

Concepts.definition: The removal of a tissue sample using a needle with a relatively large diameter, for microscopic examination.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A surgical procedure by which tissue or an organ (usually containing a tumor) is removed without rupture from a specific anatomic site.

Concepts.definition: A surgical procedure by which tissue or an organ (usually containing a tumor) is removed without rupture from a specific anatomic site.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Surgical procedure to remove tissue from the prostate using an instrument inserted through the urethra.

Concepts.definition: Prostate tissue removal via a cystoscope.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A concept unique identifier within the NCI Enterprise Vocabulary Service's NCI Thesaurus.

Concepts.definition: A concept unique identifier within the NCI Enterprise Vocabulary Service's NCI Thesaurus.
